scene_description_enriched: A female figure with a halo stands in a landscape. She is dressed in a white undergarment and a red cloak lined with gold. Her right hand is raised to her chest, and her left hand holds a golden chalice. Behind her, to the right, a stone tower with battlements is visible against a green, hilly background. To the left, trees are depicted. The scene is framed by an ornamental border.
